json.loads(r.content)\n    taskUuid = resp['status']['execution_context']['task_uuid']\n\nelse:\n    print(\"Post request failed\", r.content)\n    exit(1)\n\n# Monitor task\nstate = \"\"\nwhile state resp['spec']['resources']['disk_list'][disk_counter]\n  disk_counter += 1\n\n\nresp['spec']['resources']['power_state'] = 'ON'\n\napi_url = json.loads(r.content)\n    taskUuid = resp['status']['execution_context']['task_uuid']\n\nelse:\n    print(\"Post request failed\", r.content)\n    exit(1)\n\n# Monitor task\nstate = \"\"\nwhile state
